text: Desmoxytes rhinoparva is a species of dragon millipede in the genus Desmoxytes. It is only known from Houaphanh Province of northeastern Laos. It was first described, along with D. rhinoceros, in 2015. Both species were discovered in Laos, the first dragon millipedes identified there, D. rhinoparva in the north of the country and D. rhinoceros in the south. The holotype is in the Museum of Zoology, Chulalongkorn University, Bangkok, Thailand. The body length is in males and in females. The color is dark brown. == References == rhinoparva Category:Animals described in 2015 Category:Millipedes of Asia Category:Arthropods of Laos Category:Endemic fauna of Laos
title: Desmoxytes rhinoparva
